pages.text: $(li)The Bone is hard bio-material that can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l), $(l)Sopa De Macaco$(), an $(l:patchouli:armors/bone_armor)Bone Armor$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/depth_star)Depth Star$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/meet_your_fight/caged_heart)Caged Heart$(/l), $(l:patchouli:bosses/rumor_swampjaw)Fossil Bait$(/l) and the $(l:patchouli:tools/meet_your_fight/bone_raker)Bone Raker$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/lumberjack)Lumberjacks$(/l) will exchange the Bones by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).

$(li)Bones are placed over all the Soul Sand and Soul Soil in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/soul_sand_valley)Soul Sand Valley$(/l), so you can obtain a lot of Bones there.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/skeleton)Skeletons$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/skeleton_villager)Skeleton Villagers$(/l), $(l)Skeleton Horses$(), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/stray)Strays$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/wither_skeleton)Wither Skeletons$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/bone_serpent)Bone Serpents$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/quark/forgotten)Forgottens$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/soul_vulture)Soul Vultures$(/l) may drop this item.
